Uses of Class
org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes.QuadraticCurve

Packages that use QuadraticCurve
org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes Provides support for geometric calculations based on shapes. 
org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.utils Provides utility classes being used internally for geometric calculations. 
 

Uses of QuadraticCurve in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes
 

Methods in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes that return QuadraticCurve
 QuadraticCurve QuadraticCurve.clip(double t1, double t2)
          Clips this QuadraticCurve at parameter values t1 and t2 so that the resulting QuadraticCurve is the section of the original QuadraticCurve for the parameter interval [t1, t2].
 QuadraticCurve[] QuadraticCurve.split(double t)
          Splits this QuadraticCurve using the de Casteljau algorithm at parameter t into two separate QuadraticCurve objects.
 

Methods in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes with parameters of type QuadraticCurve
 boolean Polygon.contains(QuadraticCurve curve)
          Tests if the given QuadraticCurve curve is contained in this Polygon.
 boolean Ellipse.contains(QuadraticCurve c)
          Tests whether the given QuadraticCurve is fully contained within this Ellipse.
 Point[] QuadraticCurve.getIntersections(QuadraticCurve other)
          Calculates the intersections of two QuadraticCurves using the subdivision algorithm.
 Point[] Polygon.getIntersections(QuadraticCurve c)
          Returns the points of intersection between this Polygon and the given QuadraticCurve c.
 Point[] Line.getIntersections(QuadraticCurve c)
           
 Point[] Ellipse.getIntersections(QuadraticCurve c)
          Computes and returns the points of intersection of this Ellipse's outline with the given QuadraticCurve.
 Point[] CubicCurve.getIntersections(QuadraticCurve c)
          Returns the points of intersection between this CubicCurve and the given QuadraticCurve.
 Point[] Arc.getIntersections(QuadraticCurve c)
          Returns the points of intersection between this Arc and the given QuadraticCurve.
 boolean QuadraticCurve.intersects(QuadraticCurve other)
          Checks if two QuadraticCurves intersect each other.
 

Uses of QuadraticCurve in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.utils
 

Methods in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.utils that return QuadraticCurve
static QuadraticCurve CurveUtils.clip(QuadraticCurve c, double t1, double t2)
          Returns a new QuadraticCurve that represents the given QuadraticCurve on the parameter interval [t1;t2].
static QuadraticCurve[] CurveUtils.split(QuadraticCurve c, double t)
          Subdivides the given QuadraticCurve at parameter value t in the left and right sub-curves.
 

Methods in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.utils with parameters of type QuadraticCurve
static QuadraticCurve CurveUtils.clip(QuadraticCurve c, double t1, double t2)
          Returns a new QuadraticCurve that represents the given QuadraticCurve on the parameter interval [t1;t2].
static boolean CurveUtils.contains(QuadraticCurve c, Point p)
          Tests if the given Point lies on the given QuadraticCurve .
static Point CurveUtils.get(QuadraticCurve c, double t)
          Evaluates the Point on the given QuadraticCurve at parameter value t.
static QuadraticCurve[] CurveUtils.split(QuadraticCurve c, double t)
          Subdivides the given QuadraticCurve at parameter value t in the left and right sub-curves.
